GenomeForm
Form
internal sealed
GenomeForm

Form for genome visualization.

This is used for displaying genome's directly (e.g. a neural net structure), or some other type of visualization that uses the genome, e.g. a task view that shows how the genome performs on some task.

Functions
GenomeForm
public GenomeForm(
string title,
GenomeControl genomeCtrl
)

Construct with the provided form title, and genome control that will produce the desired view.

Properties
Genome
public IGenome Genome { get; set }

Gets or sets the genome to render.
